## R package

* [qmtsvr](): (Quasi) Multi-task Support Vector Regression methods for genome-wide prediction of complex traits. 
[`Documentation`](qmtsvr_doc.html) [`Source Code`](https://github.com/alvesand/qmtsvr)  

## R scripts  

* [SISGlabs](): A suite of R scripts to illustrate some concepts in Quantitative Genetics and Mixed Model Theory. [`Source Code`](https://github.com/alvesand/SISG_Labs_Modules_9_and_12)  

* [easymanh](): A simple and flexible function for displaying Manhattan plots using different scores. [`Source Code`](https://github.com/alvesand/easymanh)     

* [train.nn]()): A simplified R function for training a Multi-layer Perceptron Neural Network with Gradient Descent optimization and L2-norm regularization for regression analysis.[`Source Code`](https://github.com/alvesand/train.nn)     

* [simdom](): An R script for generating simulated datasets with dominance effects using QMSim outputs. [`Source Code`](https://github.com/alvesand/simdom)
